DOC.brief_title: A Crossover Study Treatment Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis COPD Smoker exsmoker least 10 year smoke least one pack cigarettes per day Meet lung function requirement Diagnosis Asthma Significant disease COPD Female pregnant lactate plan become pregnant
